title: Watch, "Mini_motion", 2003
markings: On reverse of watch: Logo (MINI in 2 concentric circles flanked by stylized wings) / "water resistant 30m all stainless steel / made in China"
provenance: 2010: acquired by Museum directly from the designer, Yves Béhar
description: Rectangular digital watch with bevel-edged black-enameled stainless steel bezel on wide, flat, black rubber strap terminating in black-enamelled stainless steel band ; four flat, rectangular fuction buttons on bezel; the word MINI on one side of read out, T2, TM, AL, on the other. Digital read out can be changed from horizontal to vertical orientation.

tombstone.epitaph: Watch, "Mini_motion", 2003.Stainless steel, enamel, rubber. Gift of Yves Béhar. 2010-4-1.
